name: MalusLapis
description:
Presents   Malus Lapis

___________________________________________________________

In the abandoned village of Bockhampton lies an old manor house, silent and undisturbed.  Until one-day passers-by noticed a glow from within.  Days turned into weeks and the manor house seemed to be consumed by crystals.  Who dares enter and discover the secrets within?

___________________________________________________________

~ ~ ~ ~Headphone Warning ~ ~ ~ ~

Game Details

Malus Lapis is a mysterious puzzle solving game designed to invite players to use the terrain and tools at their disposal in order to progress through the level.  The game has a wide range of puzzles and related to or directly involving features from the three themes.

Using the themes of:

Curling        ______          The village of Bockhampton        ______      Prof. Jillian Banfield Game Controls

W A S D  -  Movement

E  -  Interact with object

Left Mouse Button  -  Throw Curling Stone *

*Holding Left Mouse Button charges the strength of the throw

Right Mouse Button  -  Cancel Curling Stone
